import Mathlib

/--
Let $r_n$ be the $n$th smallest positive solution to $\tan x = x$ where the argument of tangent is in radians.
Prove that
$$0 < r_{n+1} - r_n - \pi < \frac{1}{(n^2+n)\pi}$$
for $n \geq 1$.
-/
theorem putnam_2024_b3
    (r : ℕ+ → ℝ)
    (r_def : StrictMono r ∧
      (∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo 0 (r 1), Real.tan x ≠ x) ∧ ∀ n,
        0 < r n ∧
        Real.tan (r n) = r n ∧
        ∀ x, x ∈ Set.Ioo (r n) (r (n + 1)) → Real.tan x ≠ x)
    (n : ℕ+) :
    r (n + 1) - r n - Real.pi ∈ Set.Ioo (0 : ℝ) (1 / ((n ^ 2 + n) * Real.pi)) :=
  sorry

    (r : ℕ+ → ℝ)

    (n : ℕ+) :

Prove that
$$0 < r_{n+1} - r_n - \pi < \frac{1}{(n^2+n)\pi}$$
for $n \geq 1$.
-/
theorem putnam_2024_b3
    (r : ℕ+ → ℝ)
    (r_def : StrictMono r ∧
      (∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo 0 (r 1), Real.tan x ≠ x) ∧ ∀ n,
        0 < r n ∧
        Real.tan (r n) = r n ∧
        ∀ x, x ∈ Set.Ioo (r n) (r (n + 1)) → Real.tan x ≠ x)
    (n : ℕ+) :

  sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2024_b3
    (r : ℕ+ → ℝ)
    (r_def : StrictMono r ∧
      (∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo 0 (r 1), Real.tan x ≠ x) ∧ ∀ n,
        0 < r n ∧
        Real.tan (r n) = r n ∧
        ∀ x, x ∈ Set.Ioo (r n) (r (n + 1)) → Real.tan x ≠ x)
    (n : ℕ+) :
    r (n + 1) - r n - Real.pi ∈ Set.Ioo (0 : ℝ) (1 / ((n ^ 2 + n) * Real.pi)) := by
  rcases r_def with ⟨r_strict_mono, r_not_in, r_eq⟩
  have h₁ := r_eq n
  have h₂ := r_eq (n + 1)
  have h₃ := r_not_in 0
  have h₄ := r_not_in (r 1)
  have h₅ := r_strict_mono (by norm_num : (1 : ℕ+) < 2)
  have h₆ := r_strict_mono (by norm_num : (2 : ℕ+) < 3)
  simp at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆
  norm_num at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆
  have h₇ := r_strict_mono (by norm_num : (1 : ℕ+) < 3)
  simp at h₇
  norm_num at h₇
  have h₈ : 0 < r n := by linarith [h₁.1]
  have h₉ : Real.tan (r n) = r n := by linarith [h₁.2.1]
  have h₁₀ : ∀ x, x ∈ Set.Ioo (r n) (r (n + 1)) → Real.tan x ≠ x := by
    intro x hx
    linarith [h₁.2.2 x hx]
  have h₁₁ : r (n + 1) - r n - Real.pi ∈ Set.Ioo (0 : ℝ) (1 / ((n ^ 2 + n) * Real.pi)) := by
    have h₁₂ : 0 < Real.pi := Real.pi_pos
    have h₁₃ : 0 < (n : ℝ) := by positivity
    have h₁₄ : 0 < (n : ℝ) ^ 2 + n := by positivity
    have h₁₅ : 0 < (n ^ 2 + n : ℝ) * Real.pi := by positivity
    have h₁₆ : r (n + 1) > r n := by
      apply r_strict_mono.lt_iff_lt.mpr
      norm_num
    have h₁₇ : r (n + 1) - r n - Real.pi > 0 := by
      nlinarith [Real.pi_gt_three]
    have h₁₈ : r (n + 1) - r n - Real.pi < 1 / ((n ^ 2 + n) * Real.pi) := by
      have h₁₉ : r (n + 1) < r (n + 1) + Real.pi := by linarith [Real.pi_pos]
      have h₂₀ : r n < r (n + 1) := by
        apply r_strict_mono.lt_iff_lt.mpr
        norm_num
      field_simp [h₁₅.ne']
      rw [← sub_pos]
      field_simp [h₁₅.ne']
      rw [← sub_pos]
      nlinarith [Real.pi_gt_three, Real.pi_pos, h₁₉, h₂₀, h₁₀ (r n + Real.pi) ⟨by nlinarith, by nlinarith⟩]
    exact ⟨by linarith, by linarith⟩
  exact h₁₁
```

        ∀ x, x ∈ Set.Ioo (r n) (r (n + 1)) → Real.tan x ≠ x)
    (n : ℕ+) :
